original: @167a / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @167a / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya ta th'a ga ta gu na dzny'a na aa tsin tya bi sha ya aa ba t'a ra ni rde sha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
analyzed: a'arya ta th'a ga ta gu na dzny'a na aa tsin tya bi sha ya aa ba t'a ra ni rde sha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
translated: Ārya-tathāgata-guṇa-jñāna-acintya-viṣaya-avatāra-nirdeśa-nāma-mahāyāna-sūtra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Noble Great Vehicle Sūtra called The Teaching on Entering the Inconceivable Realm of the Tathāgata's Qualities and Wisdom

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Volume One

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dh'a na chos kyi dbye dgon pa na byang chub kyi snying po kun tu 'od kyi khang bzang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dh'a na chos kyi dbye dgon pa na byang chub kyi snying po kun tu 'od kyi khang bzang /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in the Dharma realm of Magadha, in the palace of universal light at the heart of enlightenment,

original: bsod nams kyi rgyan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi rgyan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa /
translated: which was the accumulation of a great host of meritorious ornaments,

original: dga' ba chen po skye ba /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po skye ba /
translated: giving rise to great joy,

original: kun nas ma smad pa /
analyzed: kun nas ma smad pa /
translated: completely irreproachable,

original: yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa na bzhugs te /
analyzed: yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa na bzhugs te /
translated: and endowed with immeasurable qualities.

original: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa /
translated: “Blessed One, you have fully awakened to the equality of all phenomena.

original: legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
translated: You possess a mind that has fully understood.

original: @167b kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba /
analyzed: @167b kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba /
translated: You do not engage in dualistic conduct.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa /
translated: You have perfected the teaching of the absence of characteristics.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa /
translated: You abide in the state of buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa /
translated: You have attained the equality of all buddhas.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i rtog pa brnyes pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i rtog pa brnyes pa /
translated: You have attained unobstructed realization.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
translated: You possess the Dharma of irreversibility.

original: spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa /
analyzed: spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa /
translated: You are not carried away by objects.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rgyun mi gcod pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rgyun mi gcod pa /
translated: You do not interrupt your infinite buddha activity.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab rnam par 'jog pa /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab rnam par 'jog pa /
translated: You are inconceivable.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol tu byon pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol tu byon pa /
translated: You have perfected the absence of characteristics.

original: dus gsum la mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa /
analyzed: dus gsum la mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa /
translated: You have perfected the equality of the three times.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa /
translated: You possess a body that has entered all world systems.

original: chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba /
translated: He has the knowledge that is free of doubt about all phenomena.

original: spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba /
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba /
translated: He has the mind that possesses all conduct.

original: chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba /
analyzed: chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba /
translated: He has no uncertainty about knowing the Dharma.

original: rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba /
analyzed: rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba /
translated: He has a body that is not conceptualized.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa /
translated: He is the one who has taken up the wisdom of all bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa /
translated: He has reached the other shore of the nondual abode of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres pa rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres pa rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa /
translated: He has perfected the wisdom that liberates through the unique qualities of the tathāgatas.

original: mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /
translated: He has realized the sameness of the buddhas, who are without end or middle.

original: chos kyi dbyings dam pa can /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dam pa can /
translated: He possesses the holy realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /
translated: He is the one who has reached the end of the realm of space.

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba @168a *//
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba @168a *//
translated: He is the one who turns the wheel of the Dharma for all the enumerations of eons until the end of time.

original: rgyun mi gcod pa'i sku mnga' ba /
analyzed: rgyun mi gcod pa'i sku mnga' ba /
translated: He has a body that is uninterrupted.

original: padma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
analyzed: padma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
translated: He was seated on a lion throne at the center of a lotus.

original: dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / moonggal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang / k'a ty'a'i bu dang / ka pi na chen po dang / nag pa dang / dga' bo dang /
analyzed: dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / moonggal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang / k'a ty'a'i bu dang / ka pi na chen po dang / nag pa dang / dga' bo dang /
translated: He was together with 6,200,000 monks, such as🔽the venerable Śāriputra, Mahāmaudgalyāyana, Mahākāśyapa, Aniruddha, Subhūti, Kātyāyana, Mahākapphiṇa, Kāla, Nanda,

original: chu klung 'od srung dang / ga y'a 'od srung dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba lang bdag dang / lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / seng ldeng nags pa dang / skul byed dang /
analyzed: chu klung 'od srung dang / ga y'a 'od srung dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba lang bdag dang / lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / seng ldeng nags pa dang / skul byed dang /
translated: Nadīkāśyapa, Gayākāśyapa, Uruvilvā Kāśyapa, Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra, Godhika, Caṇḍakaṇṭaka, Śāriputra, and Kaulita.

original: gsus po che chen po dang / sgra gcan zin dang / kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad kyang chos gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba /
analyzed: gsus po che chen po dang / sgra gcan zin dang / kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad kyang chos gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba /
translated: Mahākauṣṭhila, Rāhula, Ānanda, and so forth. All of them were engaged in a single Dharma,

original: 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sha stag go /
translated: and they all abided in the domain of the noble ones.

original: thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them had entered the way of the nature of all phenomena.

original: thams cad kyang gzhi med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul ba sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang gzhi med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul ba sha stag go /
translated: All of them had the domain of space, which is without basis.

original: thams cad kyang mi rten par gnas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang mi rten par gnas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were without support.

original: thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba sha stag go /
translated: All of them were free from the arising of all the afflictions and obscurations.

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / spyod yul la zhugs @168b pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / spyod yul la zhugs @168b pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them possessed the knowledge that had entered the domain and range of the wisdom of omniscience.

original: thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhugs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhugs pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them engaged in the activities of bodhisattvas;

original: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them engaged in the way of the illumination of the realm of phenomena of all tathāgatas;

original: thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba sha stag go /
translated: all of them dedicated to the way of the Dharma;

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them facing omniscience;

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rgyun ma bcad pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rgyun ma bcad pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them on the path to omniscience that is uninterrupted;

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yid phyir ma log pa sha stag go /🔽thams cad kyang shes rab dang / ye shes mngon par grub pa'i yid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yid phyir ma log pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang shes rab dang / ye shes mngon par grub pa'i yid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them with minds that have not turned away from omniscience;🔽all of them with minds that have accomplished wisdom and knowledge;

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / lhag mthong dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / lhag mthong dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them with the highest insight of omniscient wisdom;

original: thams cad kyang thabs kyi yul dang / spyod yul las nges par byung ba sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thabs kyi yul dang / spyod yul las nges par byung ba sha stag go /
translated: all of them having emerged from the domain and sphere of activity of skillful means.

original: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang; dge slong ma grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs gcig ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang; dge slong ma grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs gcig ste /
translated: He was also accompanied by the bhikṣuṇī Mahāprajāpatī, the bhikṣuṇī Yaśodharā, and 6,200,000 other bhikṣuṇīs,

original: thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su bsdus pa sha stag go /🔽thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su bsdus pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them having gathered the completely pure Dharma.🔽all of them having approached omniscient wisdom;

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul la @169a *//🔽zhugs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul la @169a *// zhugs pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them having entered the way of the light of omniscience;

original: thams cad kyang chos thams cad dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos thams cad dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa sha stag go /
translated: all of them having realized that all phenomena are insubstantial;

original: chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med par zhugs pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med par zhugs pa /
translated: all of them having entered the characteristic of all phenomena being signless;

original: chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthar rig pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthar rig pa /
translated: all of them knowing the limit of reality of all phenomena;

original: chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / gnyen po med par mos pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / gnyen po med par mos pa /
translated: They were all devoted to the non-arising of all phenomena, to their non-cessation, and to their absence of antidotes.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all absorbed in inconceivable liberation and samādhi.

original: thams cad kyang 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par gzugs dang; lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam shin tu ston pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par gzugs dang; lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam shin tu ston pa sha stag go /
translated: They all taught form, body, color, and deportment in accordance with the beings to be trained, without conceptualization and spontaneously.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig pa la /
translated: He was also accompanied by a great saṅgha of bodhisattvas, as numerous as the atoms in a quintillion buddha realms.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They were:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas 'dren dang / kun tu sprul dang / kun tu shes rab dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu 'od dang / kun tu snang ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang /🔽kun tu rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang / shugs chen dang / shugs chen 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa @169b chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas 'dren dang / kun tu sprul dang / kun tu shes rab dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu 'od dang / kun tu snang ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang / shugs chen dang / shugs chen 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa @169b chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon dang /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Samantabhadra, Samantapūrvaka, Samantamukha, Samantaprabha, Samanta­cakṣuḥ, Samantāloka, Samantābha,

original: rtsal chen dpa' ba dang / cher bsgyings dang / bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / tshogs kyi dbang po chen po dang / spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang /
analyzed: rtsal chen dpa' ba dang / cher bsgyings dang / bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / tshogs kyi dbang po chen po dang / spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang /
translated: Samantaprabhāsa, Samanta­prajñā, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa, Samantaprabhāsa

original: zla ba bzang dang / yon tan zla ba dang / rin chen zla ba dang / kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang // chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / rnam par snang byed zla ba dang / rnam par bsgrags pa'i zla ba dang /
analyzed: zla ba bzang dang / yon tan zla ba dang / rin chen zla ba dang / kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang // chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / rnam par snang byed zla ba dang / rnam par bsgrags pa'i zla ba dang /
translated: Sucandra, Guṇacandra, Ratnacandra, Samantāvabhāsacandra, Vimaladharmacandra, Vairocana­candra, Vikhyāna­candra,

original: 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla gang dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dbyangs dang /
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla gang dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dbyangs dang /
translated: Prasphulitakusumacandra, Candracandra, Bodhisattva Mahāsattva, Candra­svara, Brahmā­svara, Brahmā­rāja­svara, Bhūmi­svara, Dharmadhātu­svara,

original: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi rnga chen sgra dbyangs dang / kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dbyangs dang / sa steng sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang /
analyzed: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi rnga chen sgra dbyangs dang / kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dbyangs dang / sa steng sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang /
translated: Melody That Destroys All Māra’s Circles, Melody of the Great Dharma Drum, Melody That Is Heard Everywhere, Melody of Nonconceptuality and Nonapprehension, Melody of the Earth, and the bodhisattva mahāsattva Melody That Outshines All Sounds.

original: kun nas snying po dang; kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang byed @170a *//
analyzed: kun nas snying po dang; kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang byed @170a *//
translated: Essence of the Whole, Completely Stainless Essence, Essence of Qualities, Essence of Vairocana, Essence of Jewels, Essence of the Moon, Essence of the Sun, and Illuminator.

original: snying po dang // padma'i dpal gyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / khyad par blo gros dang / rnam grags blo gros dang / rgyal chen blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang /

translated: Increasing Intelligence, Infinite Intelligence, Vast Intelligence, Buddha Intelligence, Inexhaustible Intelligence, Bodhisattva Mahasattva Ocean of Intelligence, Steadfast Intelligence,

translated: Vajra Intelligence, Buddha Manifest Intelligence, Mount Meru Lamp, Great Lamp, Lamp of the Dharma Lamp, Lamp Pervading All Directions, All-Pervading Lamp,

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na phyag rgya rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rin chen 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa dang /

translated: They all knew the vast way of investigating all the infinite world systems.

translated: They all were skilled in gathering the realms of beings while cutting through all elaborations and cutting through the grasping of conduct.

original: thams cad kyang mtha' dang / dpus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la shin tu mkhas pa sha stag go /🔽thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /

translated: They all were skilled in engaging with the way of the Dharma that is without end or middle.🔽They all were skilled in investigating and discerning the nonapprehending of the ripening of the karma of all beings.

original: thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi @172a *//
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi @172a *//
translated: They all were skilled in investigating and discerning the nonapprehending of the ripening of the karma of all beings.

original: bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba la shin tu dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /

translated: They were all skilled in discerning and discerning the mind, latent tendencies, faculties, undertakings, and applications.

original: thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang / blang ba shes pa yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang / blang ba shes pa yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in upholding and contemplating the meaning, words, and letters spoken by all the thus-gone ones of the past, present, and future.

original: thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in engaging the way of the Dharma, which is beyond the world and has no center or edge.

original: thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang / rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang / rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in discerning the way of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena and time.

original: thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha stag go /🔽thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang /🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po @172b kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po @172b kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.🔽They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.

original: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in the instant attainment of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future.

original: thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in the focus of the minds of all sentient beings without exception.

original: thams cad kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las mi bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las mi bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: They all had the body of a bodhisattva that is unshakable from the stage of self-arisen wisdom.

original: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa thob par spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa thob par spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
translated: They all were irreversible from the stage of the attainment of omniscience.

original: thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcod cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcod cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go /
translated: They all were engaged in the knowledge of non-conditioning while not interrupting the power of the bodhisattvas’ conditioning.

original: thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They all were skilled in the blessing of maintaining the conduct of an infinite eon for the sake of a single being.

original: thams cad kyang khyad par chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang khyad par chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in turning the wheel of the Dharma and in guiding all beings.

original: thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa'i stobs kyi khyad par dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa'i stobs kyi khyad par dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in entering the pure state of all the tathāgatas of the past, present, and future, and in the power of conduct and the perfection of aspirations.

original: @173a *// thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: @173a *// thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all endowed with the perfect intention of the special aspiration of Samantabhadra’s conduct.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi thad du 'gro zhing skul ba la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi thad du 'gro zhing skul ba la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in going to the presence of all the buddhas and in exhorting them.

original: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all skilled in upholding the way of the Dharma of all the tathāgatas.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par byed pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par byed pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were the unbroken lineage of all the buddhas.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were the ones who revealed the appearance of the buddhas in worlds where there were no buddhas.

original: thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were the ones who purified the world that was afflicted by the afflictions.

original: thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were the ones who severed the karmic obscurations of all bodhisattvas.

original: thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them had entered the unobstructed realm of phenomena.

original: thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them possessed the Dharma that was as immeasurable as the realm of space.

original: thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them possessed the sameness of the entry into the realm of phenomena.

original: thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all endowed with the equality of the limit of reality and the realm of phenomena.

original: thams cad kyang las kyis kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin @173b pa la mos pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang las kyis kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin @173b pa la mos pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all devoted to the ripening of karma just as it is.

original: thams cad kyang rgyus kun bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rgyus kun bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all devoted to the result just as it is, which is produced by causes.

original: thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all endowed with the knowledge of the equality of all phenomena, which is like the appearance of a seal and its impression.

original: thams cad kyang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all endowed with the equality of the teaching of phenomena, which is like a reflection and a mirage.

original: thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par rig pa brag ca dang mtshungs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par rig pa brag ca dang mtshungs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /
translated: They were all endowed with the knowledge that the sound of all phenomena is like an echo.

original: thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were established in inconceivable liberation and samādhi.

original: thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were playing in the samādhi of the heroic stride.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdog yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs la gnas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdog yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs la gnas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were established in the dhāraṇī of accomplishing the color of the infinite bodies of the buddhas.

original: thams cad kyang skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying all world systems on a single hair’s breadth.

original: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang /
analyzed: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying death, transference, birth, renunciation, practice of austerities, going to the seat of awakening, taming Māra,

original: mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya @174a *//
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya @174a *//
translated: they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;

original: thams cad kyang zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great parinirvāṇa;🔽they were skilled in displaying the great par

original: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the retinues of all the tathāgatas of the infinite world systems of the ten directions as the retinue of a single tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the retinue of a single tathāgata as the retinue of all the tathāgatas of all the world systems of the ten directions.

original: thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in teaching that all phenomena are without center or edge.

original: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the bodies of all beings as their own body.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs par kun tu ston @174b pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs par kun tu ston @174b pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in manifesting the bodies of all buddhas within the body of a single buddha.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in manifesting the body of a single buddha within the bodies of all buddhas.

original: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus su chud par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus su chud par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in manifesting all the world systems of the ten directions within their own bodies.

original: thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi lus la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi lus la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in manifesting the beings of the three times within the body of a single being.

original: thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the past in the future and the present, the future in the past and the present, and the present in the past and the future.

original: thams cad kyang lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la lus dpag tu med grangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la lus dpag tu med grangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in entering into samādhi with one body and rising from samādhi with countless bodies.

original: lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la /
analyzed: lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la /
translated: All of them were skilled in entering into samādhi with countless bodies

original: lus gcig las ldang bar kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: lus gcig las ldang bar kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: and rising from samādhi with one body.

original: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyis lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyis lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the full awakening of buddhahood with a body the size of all sentient beings.

original: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /🔽sems can gcig gi lus la sems @175a *//🔽can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /🔽thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyis lus las sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / sems can gcig gi lus la sems @175a *// can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyis lus las sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the bodies of all sentient beings in the body of a single sentient being.🔽All of them were skilled in displaying the body of a buddha in the body of all sentient beings.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku las sems can gyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku las sems can gyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the body of a sentient being in the body of a buddha.

original: thams cad kyang sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the body of a sentient being as the body of the Dharma.

original: thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in displaying the adornments and arrays of all realms in a single realm.

original: zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were skilled in displaying the adornments of one realm in all realms.

original: thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were skilled in displaying the dharmakāya in the bodies of sentient beings.

original: thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were skilled in displaying the ability to make all the world systems of the ten directions enter a single pore.

original: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyi gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyi gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: They were skilled in displaying the attainment of the stage of the power of the aspiration for the complete and perfect enlightenment of all buddhas.

original: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bla na med @175b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /🔽thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrang ba thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bla na med @175b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go / thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrang ba thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /
translated: All of them were skilled in ripening sentient beings to be trained in all the infinite world systems of the ten directions, and in demonstrating unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.🔽All of them were skilled in demonstrating bodies that continuously practice bodhisattva conduct in a single world system for all the eons.

translated: They were all skilled in the way of the bodhisattvas, skilled in the way of the hearers, skilled in the way of the solitary buddhas, skilled in the way of the gods, skilled in the way of the nāgas, skilled in the way of the yakṣas, skilled in the way of the gandharvas, skilled in the way of the asuras, skilled in the way of the garuḍas, skilled in the way of the kinnaras, skilled in the way of the mahoragas, skilled in the way of the śakras, skilled in the way of the brahmās, skilled in the way of the world guardians, skilled in the way of humans, and skilled in the way of nonhumans.🔽They were all skilled in the way of all beings to be trained and ripened.

translated: All of them were skilled in manifesting, spontaneously and nonconceptually, whatever form and behavior would bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: grangs med / bsam gyis mi khyab /

translated: incalculable, inconceivable,

analyzed: mtshungs pa med /🔽gzhal du med /

original: tshad med / brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /
analyzed: tshad med / brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /
translated: and also with countless, innumerable, immeasurable, inconceivable, incomparable, uncountable, unmanifest, unequaled, and unlimited bodhisattvas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g-yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g-yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /
translated: Also, from this world system, each of the hundred billion gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, together with their retinues, came to where the Blessed One was in order to see, pay homage to, venerate,

original: chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
analyzed: chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
translated: and listen to the Dharma from the Blessed One.

original: brgya byin bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya la lha'i rgyal po re re'ang g-yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: brgya byin bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya la lha'i rgyal po re re'ang g-yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /
translated: and the king of the gods Suyāma, each with a retinue of many attendants, came to see the Blessed One.🔽

original: phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
analyzed: phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
translated: and the king of the gods Suyāma, each with a retinue of many attendants, came to the place where the Blessed One was in order to see, venerate, make offerings to, serve, and listen to the Dharma.

original: ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom @177a *//
analyzed: ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom @177a *//
translated: Many millions of māras and their retinues, such as the captain, had assembled in order to see the Bhagavān, to pay homage to him, to make offerings to him, to serve him, and to listen to the Dharma.

original: ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
analyzed: ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
translated: Many tens of millions of māras, such as the captain, came to where the Blessed One was in order to see the Blessed One, to pay homage to him, to make offerings to him, to serve him, and to listen to the Dharma.

original: srin po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bco brgyad dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa lnga dang / drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag dang /

translated: Eighteen hundred thousand rākṣasa kings, thirty-eight hundred thousand bhūta kings, eighty hundred thousand asura kings, sixty-five hundred thousand vidyādhara kings, and ninety-nine hundred thousand ṛṣis, all of whom possessed the five higher perceptions,

translated: the hundred billion Brahmās, the hundred billion Mahābrahmās, the hundred billion Parīttābha,🔽the hundred billion Apramāṇābha, the hundred billion Ābhāsvara, the hundred billion Parīttaśubha,🔽the hundred billion Apramāṇaśubha, the hundred billion Śubhakṛtsna, the hundred billion Anabhraka,

original: 'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /
analyzed: 'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /
translated: the hundred billion Puṇyaprasava, the hundred billion Bṛhatphala, the hundred billion Asaṃjñisattva, the hundred billion Avṛha, the hundred billion Atapa,🔽the hundred billion Sudarśana, the hundred billion Sudṛśa, the hundred billion Akaniṣṭha, and the hundred billion Śubhakṛtsna gods, all of whom had attained the stage of nonregression, were present.

original: 'og min gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag la tshangs pa chen po re re'ang g-yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / @177b mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /

translated: The hundred billion gods of Akaniṣṭha, each with their many retinues and attendants, came to the place where the Blessed One was residing in order to see him, to pay homage to him, to make offerings to him, to honor him,

original: chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
analyzed: chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
translated: and to listen to the Dharma.

original: klu'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / dri za'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba phrag brgyad na /
